item.title: The Challenges and Concerns of Decentralized Finance
item.description: Introduction: Decentralized finance (DeFi) has emerged as an alternative financial system that promises increased autonomy, transparency, and efficiency. However, amidst its growing popularity, there are individuals who hold a deep-seated aversion towards this emerging financial paradigm. This essay aims to explore the reasons why some people harbor a dislike for decentralized finance. Pessimistic Outlook: One of the main reasons for the animosity towards decentralized finance lies in its inclination to consider worst-case scenarios.

item.title: What The Human Needs
item.description: The needs of every human being are very strange When I was a junior high school and tried to get into selection of math Olympiad, I was failed. I've never been good at being grateful, even though I'm quite old. At that time, I was looking for someone to blame, I wish I had a typical Asian parent who forced their kids to study hard. My parents are somehow religious, but unfortunately, they really make a democratic system which have this kind of problem.
